text: Anders Kraupp (born September 3, 1959 in Stockholm, Sweden) is a Swedish curler and curling coach. He competed at two Winter Olympics (2002, 2006). In 2013 he was inducted into the Swedish Curling Hall of Fame. ==Teams== ===Men's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" width=60| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second !
